message: You're one of our valued customers! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for you. With a limited number of products available, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. As a special offer, I'm willing to let it go for $10000. Will you take it home?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe this is a fair price for the uncertainty involved. I'll take it!
